description: The Columbine, Aquilegia vulgaris var. flore-pleno 'Blue Bonnet', is an amazing plant species. It produces stunning blue and white double-petal blooms in spring and summer. These flowers feature borne on delicate stems and five-lobed foliage that form a mound of beauty. Its majestic form is a common sight in gardens and is the perfect addition to any landscape bed or container. Its short-lived blooms are filled with delight and are sure to be enjoyed by all who witness them. The Columbine is sure to add a striking and dramatic charm to any garden.
